text:
Keypr - Los Angeles, CA

Keypr is redefining the guest experience at hotels worldwide!

We are an early-stage startup in the hospitality industry. Our stack is Python/Flask/Angular/iOS/Android. We are looking for a few talented iOS and front-end engineers to join our growing team.

If you want to change the way we do hotels, please send a short note to charles@keypr.com and tell us one thing you'd change. Be sure to include links to any code or relevant work (GitHub, App Store, etc.)

Cheers!
